items.q: My best friend ____________________ (live) in Germany.
I ____________________ (try) to learn Arabic.
Martin ____________________ (buy) a new car.
We ____________________ (watch) a news special on TV.
They ____________________ (rent) an apartment downtown.
to be worried ____________________ (on / about)
to inspect something ____________________ (carefully / loudly)
to climb ____________________ (the stairs / the elevator)
a ____________________ (part / piece) of cake
a(n) ____________________ (nervous / ancient) monument
to live in a ____________________ (remote / site) village
to have a ____________________ (carpet / car) in the bedroom
to stuff a ____________________ (party / bag)
to get a ____________________ (sunburn / swimming)
Hannah ____________________ Lee are painting the apartment.
I'm really thirsty, ____________________ I'm drinking a big glass of lemonade.
Christine is listening to music ____________________ checking her e-mail.
The exam isn't until Tuesday, ____________________ we have time to study.
Theo doesn't like to climb stairs, ____________________ he got an apartment on the first floor.
The baby aren't eating because her stomach is upset. ____________________
My cat is sleeping quiet on the sofa. ____________________
Carlos be not planning to return to his country this year. ____________________
I gave the taxi driver good directions, so he easy found the museum I was visiting. ____________________
Manuel runs so fastly! ____________________
Jasmine and Lucy are goes to the gym now. ____________________
We is working until late tonight. ____________________
She quick took a shower. ____________________
It seems that everyone is haveing a good time at the party. ____________________
I are cooking dinner for my family and some close friends. ____________________
This computer is really slow !
She did very poorly on the exam.
The doctor always speaks very calmly .
They cried loudly during the movie.
He answered the questions incorrectly .
Be careful on the ice. It's _____.
I'd like a _____ of apple pie, please.
It looks a little strange, but some cats do not have _____.
Water? No, thanks. I'm not _____.
Liza often has to babysit for her _____ brothers and sisters.
There are clothes everywhere! Your room is a _____.
I bought a new vacuum _____ because my old one was broken.
He spilled juice on the new _____.
Who put the _____ orange juice container back in the refrigerator?
I can't _____ what he's saying.
Boris is playing soccer. Harry is playing baseball. _________________________
This computer is fast. The screen is a good size. _________________________
Greta is cooking dinner. Her sister is a making dessert. _________________________
I'm buying new shoes today. Carissa is shopping for pants. _________________________
It was cold and windy. We cancelled the barbecue. _________________________
I felt really tired. I went to bed. _________________________
Jason is 14 years old. Jason can't drive. _________________________
Paula works during the day. Paula goes to school at night. _________________________
Sasha likes to go swimming in the morning and study in the library in the afternoon.
Ron has a big game tomorrow, so he's going to bed early.
While Julie was taking photos for the school newspaper, Robert was writing an article.
They are doing research on penguins in Alaska and seals in Canada.
We're eating dinner right now, so I can't pick up the phone.
I was late for work. I lost my car keys.
Claudia was hungry. Claudia ate an apple.
The audience cannot understand the presenter. The presenter is not speaking clearly.
Miranda is sick. Miranda is not performing in the play tonight.
The restaurant is not doing enough business to stay open. The restaurant is going to close.

Think of an event in your life that you remember well, such as a holiday celebration or a sporting match you attended. Describe the event as if it were happening right now. Use the present progressive tense as you are writing. Make sure to use compound sentences with connectors like and and so in your paragraph.
